description.value:
You wrap the target in armor made of multicolored light. It functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chromatic Armor] that is all colors (granting resistance 5 to acid, electricity, fire, force, mental, poison, and sonic). An attacker that critically fails on its saving throw against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Prismatic Armor]

Heightened (9th) The resistances increase to 10 each.
